description:
Comparing to all my other trips ... I have to say Capri is the most neurotic about Covid😏Apparently the mayor changed the regulations and now in the weekend from 16:00 until 22:00 you have to wear a face mask outside. I’ve been warned by police 5 times last night😏Every bar/restaurant you go to checks your temperature and you have to fill in your personal information🙄They even check your temperature at shops😂🤣It’s ridiculous ... My blood is boiling from anger so I always assume it must be high😂🤣 I told one of the policeman that this is truly stupid ... He said: “are you calling me stupid??”🤨I told him no, just everybody who follows the rules of your stupid government is stupid .....And walked away ... before he realized that I meant him too😂🤣😂 #cantkeepmymouthshut 

⁣ ⁣
